description.zh-cn: 中国塑性成形领域学者、清华大学机械工程系教授，中华人民共和国教育部第二批“长江学者”特聘教授。
description.en: A scholar in the field of plastic forming, a professor in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at Tsinghua University, and a distinguished professor of the second batch of the 'Chang Jiang Scholars Program' of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖高等学府之一，位于北京市。
description.en: One of the top institutions of higher learning in China, located in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国海南省省会，曾攀的出生地。
description.en: The capital city of Hainan Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Zeng Pan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: “长江学者奖励计划”是中国教育部设立的一项高层次人才计划，旨在吸引和培养具有国际影响力的学科带头人。
description.en: The 'Chang Jiang Scholars Program' is a high-level talent program established by the Ministry of Education of China, aiming to attract and cultivate academic leaders with international influence.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国西安市的一所研究型大学，以航空、航天、航海工程教育和科学研究为特色。
description.en: A research-oriented university in Xi'an, China, specializing in aeronautical, astronautical, and marine engineering education and research.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所顶尖研究型大学，专注于航空航天工程和技术。
description.en: A top research university in Beijing, China, with a focus on aeronautics and astronautics engineering and technology.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国大连市的一所重点大学，以理工科见长。
description.en: A key university in Dalian, China, known for its strength in science and engineering.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国成都市的一所重点大学，在交通工程领域享有盛誉。
description.en: A key university in Chengdu, China, with a high reputation in the field of transportation engineering.

description.zh-cn: 位于德国斯图加特的一所领先的研究型大学，尤其在工程和技术领域。
description.en: A leading research university in Stuttgart, Germany, especially in the fields of engineering and technology.

description.zh-cn: 曾攀是海南省海口市人。
description.en: Zeng Pan was a native of Haikou, Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 曾攀是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Zeng Pan was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾攀是中华人民共和国教育部第二批“长江学者”特聘教授。
description.en: Zeng Pan was a distinguished professor of the second batch of the 'Chang Jiang Scholars Program' of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1982年获西北工业大学飞机系工学学士学位。
description.en: In 1982, he received his Bachelor of Engineering degree from the Department of Aircraft at Northwestern Polytechnical University.

description.zh-cn: 1985年获北京航空航天大学航空宇航制造工程系工学硕士学位。
description.en: In 1985, he received his Master of Engineering degree from the Department of Aeronautical and Astronautical Manufacturing Engineering at Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 1988年获清华大学机械工程系工学博士学位。
description.en: In 1988, he received his Doctor of Engineering degree from the Department of Mechanical Engineering at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 1990年在该校担任博士后。
description.en: He worked as a postdoctoral fellow at the university in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 1992年在该校担任博士后。
description.en: He worked as a postdoctoral fellow at the university in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 1992年起在清华大学任教，1993年晋升为教授。
description.en: He began teaching at Tsinghua University in 1992 and was promoted to professor in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 1994年至1995年在斯图加特大学进行研究工作。
description.en: From 1994 to 1995, he conducted research work at the University of Stuttgart.
